alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Eastern Cherry; Garfield; Loup; Thomas; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:21PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Eastern Cherry; Garfield; Loup; Thomas; Wheeler
